QuestData.Title: An Urgent Meeting
QuestData.Description:
I've been looking for you all over Stormwind, $n.
The captain has delivered her report to the king. It appears that Stormwind requires your service yet again.
The leaders of the Alliance have gathered together for a meeting at Stormwind Keep, and your presence has been requested by King Wrynn himself. I was instructed to find you and deliver the message without delay.
It has been an honor serving with you, $n. May the Light bless you on your journey.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Captain Garrick at Stormwind Keep.

Objectives.Objective: Find Captain Garrick in Stormwind Keep
